Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS
AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS
REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Relates to the transfer of the regional state park police to the division of state police; repealer
Summary: Provides for the transfer of the regional state park police to the division of state police.
LawCode: Amd §58, Civ Serv L; amd §§381-b & 363-b, R & SS L; rpld §9.05 sub 4, §13.17, Pks & Rec L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil service law and the retirement and social security law, in relation to transferring the regional state park police to the division of state police; and to repeal certain provisions of the parks, recreation and historic preservation law, relating thereto
